items.sentence: We\'re going to send you to Boston to work in our office there.
We\'re waiting for Tom to finish doing what we asked him to do.
I have a nasty feeling that something awful is going to happen.
I plan to contact Tom by phone tomorrow and ask him to help us.
I can\'t believe that Tom is the one who stole Mary\'s bicycle.
I\'ve had a headache for three days and I can\'t get rid of it.
Tom probably would\'ve killed Mary if John hadn\'t stopped him.
Tom said he didn\'t know Mary couldn\'t speak French very well.
It is better to take your time than to hurry and make mistakes.
It is our custom to take off our shoes when we enter the house.
